Class to hold onto the true current state of an unum.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Arturo Bejar

UnumSoul 
 UnumSoul(Unum unum)
Create a new unum soul for the given unum. Its initial state is null.

Parameters:
unum - The "real" unum we are keeping the state for
deflector - A deflector to the unum

getDeflector 
 public Unum getDeflector()
Return the deflector to the unum.

getSoulState 
 public SoulState getSoulState()
Return the current soul state.

killUnum 
 public void killUnum()
Kill the unum this is the soul for. XXX CLEANUP: There appears to be an overlap of function here between this method and the identically named method in class 'UnumMaster'. If we can get rid of this method (which looks likely), we can get rid of the 'myUnum' instance variable as well as one of the two constructor parameters.

setSoulState 
 public void setSoulState(SoulState state)
Change the soul state.

Parameters:
state - The new setting for the soul state
